Posts.Content: mylifelisa wrote: My tumor markers have been going up over the past couple months,They started at 44 then went up to 68 and now 77. Since there going up I have to get my PET scan next week instead of next month. But I'm not sure what tumor markers really mean? mylifelisa Dx 10/31/2011, IDC, Stage IV, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tumor Markers ? mylifelisa chele

Posts.Content: mylifelisa wrote: I am new to this site.Just dx stage 4 . Mets on sternum and multi- nodules on lungs( not quite sure what that is) on 10/31/11. Getting lung biopsy tomorrow. Next week meeting w/ ong to discuss what treatment, She told me when I was dx in Oct. that I would need to get my ovaries out and do hormone therapy. Does hormone therapy really work ? I have heard alot of people saying thats what they started w/ but didn't work so they ended up doing chemo. Did anyone w/ similar mets have hormone therapy that worked right from the get go? mylifelisa Dx 10/31/2011, IDC, Stage IV, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hormone therapy ? mylifelisa Chickadee
